entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate removing nops from substitutions #81339
    Future
  • Ban SR.GetResourceString #81338
    8.0.0
  • Need _udiv128 intrinsic as a .Net API, eg, Math.BigDivRem. #81337
  • [API Proposal]: `Unsafe.Bitcast` for efficient type reinterpretation #81334
  • [wasm] [debugger] Compilation error in debugger on `Debugger.evaluateOnCallFrame` command contains `stacktrace` in format that is not compatible with CDP #81333
    8.0.0
  • Rewrite SpanHelpers.IndexOfNullByte/IndexOfNullCharacter to unmanaged pointers #81332
  • hex number format in .net 7 jit assembly #81329
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988.sh #81326
  • Test failure profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #81324
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation/rundownvalidation.sh #81323

Closed

  • Segfault when attaching profiler #80683
    Future
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) #79955
  • `MetricsEventSource` Not Publishing `UpDownCounter` For `dotnet-counters`/`dotnet-monitor`? #79916
    8.0.0
  • InterpolatedStringHandler methods on struct types are called on the wrong method target #81322

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Default null columnNumber to 0 #81336
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    community-contribution
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Count in a few places #81325
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fixing a comment attached to DEFAULT_UNROLL_LOOP_MAX_ITERATION_COUNT #81300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf in RsaPaddingProcessor.FillNonZeroBytes #81327
    area-System.Security
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution

Updated

  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize `HexConverter.FromChar` #81146
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
